headline: Syntec Optics (Nasdaq: OPTX) CEO to Speak to Global Leaders about Future of Advanced Optics
summary: ROCHESTER, NEW YORK, Jan. 14, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Syntec Optics Holdings, Inc. (Nasdaq: OPTX) (“Syntec Optics” or the “Company”), a leading provider of technology products to defense, biomedical, communications, and consumer end-market leaders, today announced its Chairman and CEO shall speak at the upcoming Optica Industry Summit on Advanced Optics, co-hosted by Optica and Corning Inc.
